item.title: Bruno Mars - The Lazy Song - Key of G - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song The Lazy Song by Bruno Mars from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: Am, B7, Bm, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Bruno Mars - Marry You - Key of F - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Marry You by Bruno Mars from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: B♭, F, Gm.

item.title: Bruno Mars - Count on Me - Key of C - Andy Ramos
item.description: Play along video for the song Count on Me by Bruno Mars from the channel Andy Ramos. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Dm, Em, F, G.

item.title: Bruno Mars - Just the Way You Are - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Just the Way You Are by Bruno Mars from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: B♭, Dm, F.
